question: 嬉しい
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>glad</kanji>? It's also <vocabulary>glad</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: Whenever you're really <vocabulary>glad</vocabulary> to be alive, you look up at the sun's rays and sing, "<reading>Ooh, ray</reading>s (<ja>うれ</ja>), I'm so glad you're here!" Then your Uncle Ray comes dancing into the room and sings back, "Ooh, Ray is <vocabulary>happy</vocabulary> you're happy!" The sun's rays and Uncle Ray both make you really happy.
